description: This PHP class defines a queued job for sending batch event invitation emails, including generating PDFs and handling batch API responses.

classes.name: SendBatchEventInvitationJob
classes.description: A Laravel queued job class responsible for sending batch event invitation emails with PDF attachments.

methods.name: backoff
methods.description: Returns an array of seconds to wait before retrying the job, implementing exponential backoff.

methods.name: __construct
methods.description: Initializes the job with an array of invitation details.

methods.name: handle
methods.description: Executes the job: prepares batch emails with HTML content and PDFs, sends them via the Resend API, and logs the process.
